page.title: 11USK DETENTION CENTRE
page.content: The{detention centre}is one of the main employers locally having about{35 men and women on staff. It was built in{1842}for men women and children. At this time hangings took place including the hanging of the{Llangybi murderer}of{1878,}who murdered a family of 5. The last hanging was in 1921. The{detention centre}is made up of around 250 rooms.It holds{110 boys aged from 17 to 21. Each cell contains a bed,chair,locker and desk. The young offender receives{Â£1.40}for working and gets 1/3 remission from his sentence if well behaved. He has 3 cooked meals a day and in between he cleans,paints and works. The {production of concrete}slabs is a thriving cottage industry.
